code:
classDiagram
    direction TB

    %% Controllers Layer
    class Controllers {FinTech_LedgerService}

    %% Services Layer
    class Services {FinTech_TransactionQueue}

    %% Repositories Layer
    class Repositories {FinTech_PaymentGateway}

    %% Domain Models
    class DomainModels {FinTech_AuthVault}

    %% DTOs
    class DTOs {FinTech_FraudDetection}

    %% Design Patterns
    class Patterns {FinTech_FraudDetection}

    %% Security & Configuration
    class Security {FinTech_AuthVault}

    %% Relationships
    Controllers --> Services : uses
    Controllers --> DTOs : returns
    Services --> Repositories : uses
    Services --> Patterns : uses
    Services --> Security : uses
    Repositories --> DomainModels : persists
    Security --> Controllers : protects
    DomainModels --> DomainModels : relationships
repo_description: A full-stack business management solution designed for small to medium-sized businesses to manage their organization, employees, and payroll operations in a unified system.
